text: Tom Grebis (December 21, 1930 – January 24, 2005) was an American football player and coach. He served as the head football coach at Drexel University from 1961 to 1968. ==Head coaching record== ==References== ==External links== * Drexel Hall of Fame profile * Category:1930 births Category:2005 deaths Category:Drexel Dragons football coaches Category:Drexel Dragons football players Category:People from Somerset County, Pennsylvania Category:Players of American football from Pennsylvania
title: Tom Grebis
